dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependent_to.description:
This package provides runtime libraries required to use parsers
generated for the Cpp language by version 4 of ANTLR (ANother Tool for
Language Recognition).
dependent_to.name: antlr4-cpp-runtime

dependent_to.description:
BLAT (BLAST-like alignment tool) is a pairwise sequence alignment
algorithm.
dependent_to.name: blat

dependent_to.description:
The Distributed Asynchronous Object Storage (DAOS) is an open-source
software-defined object store designed from the ground up for massively
distributed Non Volatile Memory (NVM).
dependent_to.name: daos

dependent_to.description: Independent project for Flux security code and APIs.
dependent_to.name: flux-security

dependent_to.description: Jim Kent command line bioinformatic utilities
dependent_to.name: kentutils

dependent_to.description: Remove lines from bed file that refer to off-chromosome locations.
dependent_to.name: ucsc-bedclip

dependent_to.description: Convert a bedGraph file to bigWig format.
dependent_to.name: ucsc-bedgraphtobigwig

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
